radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar atelectasis, no pleural or pericardial effusion; post percutaneous left lower quadrant pigtail drainage catheter placement into a posterior abscess (4.1 x 1.7 cm, previously 4.9 x 1.7 cm) with interval resolution of the fluid component. The intramural abscess within the sigmoid colon has decreased in size; retrouterine abscess stable at 3.1 x 2.2 cm. No free fluid in the pelvis, unremarkable uterus and bilateral adnexae, no abdominopelvic lymphadenopathy, unchanged bones.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The posterior abscess has decreased in size; the previously described intramural abscess within the sigmoid colon has decreased in size. No new or enlarging abscess.
